item.title: "Lobo, Baby!:"James Gunn Recalls Getting Text From Jason Momoa About Lobo Casting, Teases First Images Of The DC Antihero
item.description: The casting of Jason Momoa as Lobo in the new DC Universe gets explained by James Gunn while also teasing the first images of the new antihero.

item.title: "These Are All Characters That Transcend Language:" James Gunn Discusses DC Studios' "Writer-Driven" Approach To Adapting "The Greatest Heroes And Villains That The World Has Ever Known"
item.description: DC Studio co-CEO James Gunn shares how the new DC Universe franchise is heavily driven by strong scripts as they bring heroes and villains to life.

item.title: Forget John Wick 5, This Is The Keanu Reeves Franchise That Needs Another Movie
item.description: There's been a lot of speculation and excitement about John Wick 5, but there's a different Keanu Reeves action franchise that needs a new sequel.
